thumb.title: [TAS] NES Vs. Air Man by HappyLee in 01:11.25
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qr71iYenbvY以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6559MTAS originally published on 2025-05-26Vs. Air Man is a short Super Mario Bros. ROM hack made by ATA in 2000. It sets Mario in the Air Man stage from Mega Man 2, and the goal is to defeat the Robot Master while Can't Defeat Airman is playing. HappyLee ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/HappyLee) defeats Air Man in record time.PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: There are flashing lights upon pressing Start on the title screen, which may cause epileptic seizures to those affected.
thumb.last_res_body: サビ終わらなかった ROMのベースはスー... ロックマンもこれ... エアーマンが倒せ... 令和やぞ MKFかな？

tags.tag: エアーマンが倒せない
